attributes.action: Stop Killing muslim in Myanmar & Take back Aung San Suu Kyi's Nobel Peace Prize.
attributes.background:
Everyday Myanmar(Bharma) Arkan army killing innocent muslims. This is juidicial killing but the whole world is silent!!! We need to stop it urgently.
we also want to take back noble prize from Aung san Suu.. she is nothing doing to stop it.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the Nobel Prize.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/173339
